name: Área de Autocaravanas | Puerto de Caleta de Vélez
title: (29751) Área de Autocaravanas | Puerto de Caleta de Vélez
title_short: (29751) Área de Autocaravanas | Puerto de Caleta de Vélez
description: Caleta de Velez marina, an area authorized by the Junta de Andalucía. Excellent ample level of RV parking with views. Access through a barrier by positioning your vehicle in front of it (approximately 1m away). In the case of several motorhomes, a minimum distance of 3 meters must be maintained when entering and wait for the barrier to lower before positioning in front of it. If there are free places, the barrier will open automatically taking the data of the registration and time of entry to the area. To request your stay in the area, you must enter the first two digits of your license plate and select yours from the one offered by the system. You must select one of the places offered by the system as free (green), indicate the desired days of stay and proceed to pay with your card. Free showers, as well as all port services.

title: (29751) Algarrobo-Costa - 86 Avenida de Andalucía
description: Drinkable watertap, right on the main road. Good accessibility for all types of campers.

title: (29749) El Hornillo - 60 Diseminado el Hornillo
description: A nice place right in front of the "El Hornillo" beach with dark sand/gravel. There are bathrooms with showers, disposal stations for gray and black water, a small laundry room and WiFi. The square is 5 minutes walk from the town of Almayate and 10 minutes from Torre del Mar.

name: Camping Almayate Costa
title: (29749) Camping Almayate Costa
description: The place was pleasant, but was assigned, no choice possible. Supply and disposal outside the square. To get drinking water, you have to inform the reception. Waste separation good, but also outside. The place is occupied by many permanent campers, mainly Germans. Sanitary facilities very good. Only the toilet paper has to be fetched in the aisle, no paper in the cabin. Washing machines good, restaurant good.

name: AMG Almayate
title: (29749) AMG Almayate
description: Some sites reserved by dealership (10) 100 m from the beach. this site is app 4 km from Torre de Mar. on the 340.  not Valdez Malaga

title: (29760) - 28 Diseminado Chorrera

The site is at the foot of the repeaters, with 2 esplanades for 3 well-positioned vans. I think motorhomes have a hard time being small, medium I would not put it on the road. Before arriving here there is another esplanade but it is located next to a house. the surroundings are steep, with quite fragrant scrub vegetation.

title: (29752) Sayalonga - 62 Calle Loma
description: Quiet place next to the municipal swimming pool. A nearby road passes but as of 22:00 only a couple of cars passed. about 60m there is a picnic area.

description: A really nice place to stay with a view of the sea! Best drive up with the off-road vehicle! (4x4) As you can see in the picture, it's a bit difficult to park straight, but it's possible with a bit of talent!?? Very quiet!? you can hardly hear the street below!

title: (29749) Vélez-Málaga - 4 Avenida de España

title: (29792) Cajiz - 503 Diseminado Cajiz Rural
description: Less than 10 minutes from the motorway and at the top of a small concrete mountain road, this flat car park offers a beautiful view of the surrounding hills and, a few steps away, the azure coast! For one night, it is very quiet (a few dogs meet in the distance), airy and clean. We hope that by sharing this spot, everyone will make sure it stays that way by not leaving any rubbish behind. Enjoy ;-)

title: (29752) Sayalonga - 161 Diseminado Diseminados

description: We only parked for a while to see the town, right next to the road. In principle, it does not put anything that prevents it. The town surprised us, very small but very picturesque. Several hiking trails to follow and monuments to see that are surprising.

title: (29712) Viñuela - A-402

description: Recinto ferial site so may not always be available. Flat, quiet, good breeze, some small trees for a little shade. Short walk into the village.

title: (29715) Sedella - MA-126
description: Directly under the street, but little traffic. View over the mountains to the sea. Easy access. Is an option for campers who do not want to go up to the hiking parking lot. 4G. No complaints from residents. Electricity pylons right on the edge of the square. Have cleared the place. Two full days were there without any problems. Further down the driveway there is also space.

title: (29716) Canillas de Aceituno - MA-126
description: At this point there is drinking water, which can be filled into canisters or bottles. Locals also get water there. A little further on the street is a wide parking space for two mobile homes.

title: (29712) Viñuela - A-402
description: Picnic area under conifers and sunny spots in the reservoir. Hold fixed areas. In the bathing lake ban. Outside the very quiet season and a beautiful view.

title: (29712) Viñuela - A-356

description: Gas station with gas bottles, car wash, toilets and washing machine and dryer and supermarket.

title: (29770) Torrox - 285 Autovía del Mediterráneo
description: Parking in front of the petrol station parking place for semi-trailer and camper, we stopped to rest for two hours without problem

name: Área El Mosquin
title: (29755) Área El Mosquin
description: The El Mosquín Motorhome Area is located in the town of Canillas de Albaida, a municipality known for being the pearl of the Axarquía Malagueña. It is located at the foot of the Sierras de Tejeda and Almijara. Near the Gran Senda de Málaga, the location allows the realization of hiking routes such as the "Fábrica de La Luz" route just three kilometers from the area or the recently inaugurated "Ruta de los Molinos, among others. Cómpeta is located just two kilometers, twenty minutes walking from the area. Possibility of carrying out wine tourism activities, guided visits and tastings, in wine cellars such as the prestigious Bodegas Almijara. The area has services, emptying of water and waste, free wifi, electricity and drinking water TO ACCESS IT IS NECESSARY TO CONTACT BY PHONE WHEN ARRIVING IN THE AREA, OR A FEW MINUTES IN PRIORITY.

address.street: C. Carril de Santana, Canillas de Albaida, Málaga

title: (29718) Malaga - 70 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Simple Parking Area. Not sure about staying the night. Good for visiting the village. Highly recommend the café in the Alcúa Park!

name: Camping Rural Presa La Viñuela
title: (29713) Camping Rural Presa La Viñuela
description: Camping Presa La Viñuela. Rural campsite in shaded terraces. Beautiful big swimming pool open. Lovely views and access to lake walks and two good restaurants to choose from.

title: (29754) Cómpeta - 87 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Platform at the top of the village, no prohibition signs, space for about ten vehicles

description:
This cute German bakery is located almost directly on the beach and on the Passeo. Parking and garbage disposal directly in the street.
Beautiful view, from the sunny or shaded outdoor tables, one has a view of palm trees, parrots and the sea.

title: (29793) Torrox - 77 Avenida de Competa
description: Large, quiet, level parking lot. Close to the center of the city.

title: (29790) Vélez-Málaga - 23A Urbanización Torre de Chilches
description: Nice place for a break or a swim in the sea. Lots of free parking spaces even in summer (at least during the week). Beach showers within walking distance. Dogs on the beach are no problem (I don't know if they're allowed, but nobody bothered). Directly on the street, but the traffic is limited.

title: (29718) - 57 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Lot parking lot quite large, which is a beautiful panoramic platform on all the mountains around ... 6 km from Comares, splendid Arab village to visit absolutely ..

description: Very large parking lot for at least 100 vehicles or 30 motorhomes. Completely unregulated. Gravel and sand soil.

title: (29790) Vélez-Málaga - N-340

title: (29711) Alcaucín - 8 Plaza Salia
description: Good place right next to the town square flea market on Saturday mornings lots of drinking fountains before you get to the car park

title: (29738) Benagalbón - 97 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Plot of 600 meters completely flat with views of the ? Fenced around the perimeter with a normal entrance door and a 5-meter sliding door and a very quiet area, easy access and exit.

name: Camping El Pino
title: (29793) Camping El Pino
description:
The campsite El Pino gives you the opportunity to make the most of your holidays in the Costa del Sol. Situated in the Axarquia County, and surrounded by avocado and tropical trees, the campsite is known for its excellent views, the freshness of the avocado trees’ shade, its sunny areas during the winter, as well as for its quietness and family atmosphere.

El Pino is a second category campsite, and there are 382 pitches and 47 bungalows. There is a bar, a restaurant, a supermarket, a swimming pool, laundry, free wifi, etc. It is open the whole year. The pleasant temperatures in the county make the camping an excellent spot for the summer and ideal for the winter.

address.street: Avenida Miguel de Cervantes, nº22, Urbanización Torrox Park

name: Camper Area Mh El Rincon
title: (29738) Camper Area Mh El Rincon
description: Small, nice private parking space not far from the sea (800 meters). The approach goes through narrow streets, but can be mastered with larger vehicles up to 7.50m. Warm and nice reception at the reception with lots of information about the place and the area. Small supermarket on site. Wet area clean. additional consumption will be charged extra.

title: (29755) Canillas de Albaida - Camino de Renzuelas
title_short: (29755) Canillas de Albaida - Camino de Renzuelas
description: Great spot in the middle of nowhere, nor really flat but flat enough, no traffic

title: (29738) Torre de Benagalbón - 6 Calle Tierra
description: We arrived at Rincón de la Victoria on a very very hot day. Our goal was to find a shadow, and we did (we worked the nature around it). It is a single parking spot (for just one motorhome) under and behind a bunch of "bamboo canes". Truth is we have created a shaded place and we felt very well for the three days we stayed. There is a park at the corner (right next to the designated parking space for a few motorhomes-no shadow). In that park there is a tap where we could fill our water bottles. At this point, there is a severe drought in whole Andalucia, so we are happy about this possibility. There are recycling waste bins 10m in the direction to the park. The police passed by: they were friendly but told us to not eat outside.

title: (29793) Torrox - 11 Avenida del Peñoncillo
description: Water tap without connection. Sufficient parking spaces nearby.

title: (29738) Torre de Benagalbón - 91 Cortijo la Capilla
title_short: (29738) Torre de Benagalbón - 91 Cortijo la Capilla
description: Please note, this parking lot is not the private rest area located less than a kilometer away. The photos that had been posted did not correspond to this parking lot. This parking is possible day / night without any equipment, very slightly on a slope. (we stayed there 2 days / nights during holy week). Between gardens (henhouse!), Residential houses and play area for children (and dogs !!) Bus to Malaga nearby (5 mins walk). Very good compromise when the guarded area indicated nearby on the site is full at 5 p.m. even in March.

title: (29738) Torre de Benagalbón - 4A Avenida de la Axarquía
title_short: (29738) Torre de Benagalbón - 4A Avenida de la Axarquía
description: Parking a few meters from the beach with restaurants, cafes and showers on the beach. Bright and safe neighborhood near the center of Torre de Benalgabon. off season only

title: (29755) - 89 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Free parking area. Toilets, water and showers. We didn't stay here, we just walked by, but it looks like a great place in the middle of nowhere. Could be crowded in summer.

title: (29770) Torrox - 43a N-340
description:
Parking Miramar in Costa del Sol in Torrox Costa, In a pleasant environment with 22 plots. We have showers, toilets, sinks, wastewater emptying and water filling, electricity, Wi-Fi and washing machine, dryer, in front of the beach and very familiar. Important : reservation by phone message.
Children under 18 free and dog too.

title: (29770) Torrox-Costa - Carretera el Peñoncillo
description: MiluCar is located in a unique location from where you have a sea view. We offer 40 plots and have a sanitary unit with toilets / showers, washing machine / dryer, WIFI, Electricity 10A, Service port, water tap, bread service and a lower daily rate after 30 days. We speak German, English, Spanish and Dutch at our reception.

title: (29730) Rincón de la Victoria - 16 Carretera Benagalbón
title_short: (29730) Rincón de la Victoria - 16 Carretera Benagalbón
description: Rest area to spend the night near the highway in the school car park

title: (29770) El Peñoncillo - Unnamed Road
description: Almost at the top of the hill, beautiful space with magnificent sea view. Clean, very quiet place, slightly set back from the road. Accessible by van without problem. For motorhomes, the road leading to the spot is narrow but hard. Note that the spot is located under the relay antennas.

title: (29730) Rincón de la Victoria - 16A Cortijo el Acebuchal
title_short: (29730) Rincón de la Victoria - 16A Cortijo el Acebuchal
description: Laundromat at the gas pump There is water. Gas and a small jet wash

title: (29770) Torrox - 30 Carretera de Almería
description: About 8 parking spaces on the beach next to beach bars. Beach showers. Stone beach and black sand. There are no prohibition signs.

name: Paradise Beach Camper Area
title: (29770) Paradise Beach Camper Area
description: Beautiful new plot with sea views. The place is fenced and closed at night. washing machine is coming. 1 shower and toilet for men and for women, not always with hot water. The course is almost straight and strewn with gravel and is run with a lot of warmth and love by Valentina and Andrea. Electricity of your choice with 16 amps . Please keep in mind that the street is noisy.

title: (29195) Comares - 5 Avenida de Málaga
description:
Large sloping municipal carpark. 
Awesome views very quiet.

title: (29711) Alcaucín - Unnamed Road
description: The Alcázar playgrounds. Camping forbidden.

title: (29195) Comares - 12 Calle Peñantona
description: Small flat parking at the start of the giant zip line. Very quiet corner, almost without passages. Quiet night, as we on the parking lot. Splendid view, fountain with drinking water and garbage disposal available.

title: (29793) Torrox - 1E Arrabal Sector Unp
description: We have not been to this spot, but to the one next door. We discovered this spot while going for a walk. Very little traffic and a magnificent view. Provide wedges!

title: (29710) Las Mayoralas - 5 Lugar las Mayoralas
description: Nice place next to the artificial lake. Calm. Drinking water and trash can at the picnic area next door.

title: (29793) Torrox - 2 Carretera el Peñoncillo
description: Area to park

title: (29710) Periana -
description:
Quiet spot for one vehicule over flowery valley, olive trees and view on distant mountains. 
No shade and passing farm traffic.

name: Circuito Calaceite
title: (29793) Circuito Calaceite
description: 4x4 recommended, but also possible with normal van, no big camper. Great view, fully flat, highway audible.

title: (29718) El Borge - 351 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Mega beautiful spot for a perfect view.

title: (29754) Cómpeta - 16 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Good place to sleep in the middle of nature

title: (29711) Alcaucín - Camino de los Colmenares
description: Mirador de Pedro Aguilar, a little above the "El Alcazar" leisure area. In the recreation area you will find barbecues, toilets, showers.

title: (29710) Periana - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic area with tables, trash and barbecue. Very calm

title: (29770) El Peñoncillo -
description: Improvised place to spend the night by the sea, with enough space for 4 motorhomes, although we are totally alone. Near here there is another marked parking lot but with more influx of vehicles. The only downside is that it is next to the road but at this time there is not much traffic and you can rest well.

title: (29770) El Peñoncillo - Unnamed Road
description: Superb spot in height. Wonderful view! Easy to access with a van.

title: (29793) Torrox - Unnamed Road
description: Some places to spend a night or more with sea views on both sides! Amazing landscape and quiet corner by the road. Accessible only to vans or small camper.

title: (29730) Torre de Benagalbón - 1 Pasaje del Virrey
title_short: (29730) Torre de Benagalbón - 1 Pasaje del Virrey
description: It has signs forbidden motorhomes. I don't know if you can sleep. It is in front of the beach and the promenade, I am afraid that only parking during the day

title: (29793) Torrox - Carretera el Peñoncillo
description: Towards Torrox to Nerja, next to the fantastic beach. There are no services, only parking and beach

title: (29793) Torrox - 1 Calle Tizziano
description:
Beautiful view of Nerja. 

I stayed at another pitch one night and saw another larger camper staying here so I tried it the 2nd night. It's not a huge space, One van comfortably and two is possible. 

It is flat with a nice view, however there is some construction in the morning. Ideal for one night.

title: (29730) Rincón de la Victoria - km 254 Autovía del Mediterráneo
title_short: (29730) Rincón de la Victoria - km 254 Autovía del Mediterráneo
description: Inexpensive gas station with washing area / tub for dogs. Very nice staff.

title: (29730) Rincón de la Victoria - 1 Paseo Marítimo Virgen del Carmen
title_short: (29730) Rincón de la Victoria - 1 Paseo Marítimo Virgen del Carmen
description: Parking in a dry stream...there are no prohibition signs...in low season there is no problem for a day/night...a beach bar next door that offers luxury food...next promenade...avenue with shops close...parks for children not far away...quiet place

title: (29730) Rincón de la Victoria - Avenida Cotomar
title_short: (29730) Rincón de la Victoria - Avenida Cotomar
description: New free parking, very well located, all level and illuminated. There is no sign that prohibits overnight or AC. Nearby walking 2 minutes there is a Mercadona, also a bakery and chicken grill and take away food, bars, bus stop and a large playground. The beach is in the back street a 2 minute walk away. In this town you can visit the treasure cave, Bezmiliana fort house, good beaches and beach bars. Quiet zone. On Wednesdays they put on the flea market, so you can't park.

title: (29793) Torrox - 2520 Diseminado Pago Frontiles
description: Very Beautiful Road side parking which has a natural noise shelter - a massive cliff between the main Road and carpark. No Houses around, a little restaurant down the road. Vind " mijnheer Teuntje " ook !

title: (29780) Nerja - 1E Calle Ladera Panorama
description: Parking between the municipalities of Torrox and Nerja, before the sign for the municipality of Nerja prohibiting overnight stays.

title: (29780) Nerja - N-340
description: Good place, quiet, very good views. There are like 10 car parks at each stop

title: (29710) Periana - Finca Oasis Las Palmeras
description: Beautiful site with mountain, lake and sea views. 2 minutes away from the  typical Andalucian village of Periana (shops, doctors, banks etc). Water, electricity, waste disposal. Restaurant on site. Secure. Locked at night. Lots of walking routes, bird watching, mountain biking. Half hour from coast. Booking essential. Access via Periana village recommended.

title: (29710) Periana - 24 Calle Alferez Manuel Jimenez
description: Drinking water push button

title: (29730) Rincón de la Victoria - 14 Calle la Corta
title_short: (29730) Rincón de la Victoria - 14 Calle la Corta
description: Laundromat

title: (29780) Nerja - 3 Urbanización Marinas de Nerja
description: Parking in front of a hotel when it is closed, ie out of season. Super quiet and beach 100 meters away…

title: (29789) Frigiliana - 17 Calle Don Francisco Ruiz Noguera
title_short: (29789) Frigiliana - 17 Calle Don Francisco Ruiz Noguera
description: Very quiet place, enough places and well leveled

title: (29788) Frigiliana - 11209 MA-5105
description: Parking near the center of Fragiliana

title: (29788) Frigiliana - 1 Calle Vial a P.blanquillo
description: Space for 1 or 2 camper. Not more than 6 meters. well leveled

title: (29730) Rincón de la Victoria - 3-1 Plaza San José Calasanz
title_short: (29730) Rincón de la Victoria - 3-1 Plaza San José Calasanz
description: Parking near the beach quiet but very busy in the morning.

name: Camping Cortijo de San Miguel
title: (29780) Camping Cortijo de San Miguel
description: Well maintained ecological campsite with a super friendly welcome. 100m from the sea and you can walk or cycle along the water to the village. Pitches are roughly gravelled.

title: (29710) Periana - 12 Calle Aijaznatejo
description: Typical town of the Axarquia Malagueña that maintains all its essence and peculiarity. The Parking is gravel. The van can be parked without problems. If you prefer, 20 meters away you can park on asphalt in some urbanized plots that have not been built. Garbage bins are nearby but they are on the next street.

title: (29730) La Cala del Moral - 7A Calle Zurbarán
title_short: (29730) La Cala del Moral - 7A Calle Zurbarán
description: Free place with a beautiful sea view. There are no services. With direct stairs to the beach. They fine if it is abused, no more than one day. Do not camp, or put wedges, the neighbors denounce. Bottles and young people on weekends making noises and their little things.

title: (29720) La Cala del Moral - Calle Julio Romero de Torres
title_short: (29720) La Cala del Moral - Calle Julio Romero de Torres
description: fountain with drinking water

title: (29720) La Cala del Moral - 21 Avenida de Picasso
title_short: (29720) La Cala del Moral - 21 Avenida de Picasso
description: Small picnic area next to the treasure cave with benches in the shade and garbage cans. A fountain is present but out of service for the moment other fountains next to the basketball court, playground for dogs.

title: (29730) Rincón de la Victoria - 14 Avenida de Picasso
title_short: (29730) Rincón de la Victoria - 14 Avenida de Picasso
description: Free motorhome parking, residential area, water, illuminated, quiet area, next to the treasure caves

title: (29780) Nerja - Carretera de Almería
description: Laundromat.

title: (29789) Frigiliana - Avenida Alcalde Antonio Villasclaras
description: CEPSA Gas station with all services. Glass bottle exchange (Repsol). gray water disposal. Toilet disposal, but without water. fresh water. Clean RV wash facility with scaffolding on both sides to the roof. washing machines. Restaurant. Unfortunately, the parking space is very limited.

title: (18120) Alhama de Granada -
description: Large / beautiful trail parking lot with barbecue, seating and water points. Cold showers and toilets (probably open in the season). Starting point for hikes. Directions via gravel road. Not suitable for large campers.

title: (29780) Nerja - Unnamed Road
description: Place to leave the camper quietly, beach at 50 meters and city center at less than 500 meters

title: (18125) Ventas de Zafarraya - 53 Calle Delicias
description: Picnic area with great views, approx. 10 - 15 parking spaces for cars

title: (29780) Nerja - N 340
description: Repsol office, first purchase and exchange of propane and butane cylinders possible. the purchase was easy, without presenting a contract or a passport. Our salesman also spoke good English.

title: (29730) La Cala del Moral - Calle Amadeo Vives
title_short: (29730) La Cala del Moral - Calle Amadeo Vives
description: Beach parking with van. not for mobile homes

title: (29780) Nerja - 10 Avenida Mediterraneo
description:
The missing sock
Washing machines, Lavadoras

title: (29780) - 11 Diseminado Diseminados
description:
Cheap parking for cars and motorhomes with the possibility of overnight stays and multi-day stays.

Wide paved parking spaces in fenced and guarded outdoor parking, next to the Rapto Europa monument.

Services
Attention 24h/365
Card payment is accepted
Free water supply service and
sewage tank

150 m away from the Repsol gas station there is a vehicle washing service, washers/dryers and propane sales, etc.

Location:

A 5-minute walk from the town center and 10/12 minutes from the main tourist attractions of Nerja. Park at Parking Nerja Rapto Europa at a good price and enjoy Nerja without worries.


Distance points of interest (POI)
0 m Rato Europa Monument
400 m Verano Azúl Park
650 m whitebait
750 m Repsol Service Station (Agreement with Parking*)
800 m Nerja Museum- Nerja History
900 m El Salvador Church
900 m from Balcón de Europa Square
1100 m Calahonda beach
1100 m Plaza de los Cangrejos Park
1200 m Torrecilla beach
3.9 Km the Aguila Aqueduct
4.9 Km Caves of Nerja

title: (29730) Rincón de la Victoria - 6 Avenida de Málaga
title_short: (29730) Rincón de la Victoria - 6 Avenida de Málaga
description: Repsol Tabsktelle with laundry service

title: (29789) Frigiliana - Autovía del Mediterráneo
description: Free parking on dirt roads, along the Chillar Rios, near the beginning of the river path. Quiet even at night, we stayed for 5 nights without any problems. Two different access roads from Nerja. Ten minutes walk from the city.

title: (29720) La Cala del Moral - 66 Paseo Blas Infante
title_short: (29720) La Cala del Moral - 66 Paseo Blas Infante
description: Parking only to spend the day

title: (29780) Nerja - 26 Calle Castilla Pérez
description: Laundry, no parking

title: (29780) Nerja - 0 Plaza de la Ermita
description: Drinking water tap

title: (29780) Nerja - 5c Plaza de España
description: Underground parking max 2m

title: (18120) -
description: Free parking day and night for motorhomes. Restaurant next door.

title: (29720) La Cala del Moral - 133 Avenida de Málaga
title_short: (29720) La Cala del Moral - 133 Avenida de Málaga
description: Self service Laundette far cheaper and better machines than on the Area Malaga Beach site.

title: (18125) Valdeiglesias -
description: Recreational area of Robledal, access to the path leading to the maroma. We spent the night quiet, alone with animals outside the van. Freshwater taps, grills and barbecues. Access not closed and without explicit prohibitions on the billboard, except to make a fire.

title: (29780) Nerja - 54 Calle Hernando de Carabeo
description: Very central carpark to Nerja’s beautiful beach and town (must visit) Very spacious, room for any sized camper. Access via ticket and a boom gate and pay at the machine before you drive out. Unsure if you can stay the night here.

title: (29017) - 44 Diseminado R 10
description: Pitch Malaga Beach Area Well maintained camping pitch (no tents or caravans) directly on the dog beach, but 100 meters further a normal beach. Access through the locked door, for which you will receive a card. Spacious and clean showers. 4 amp power is included in the price. For WIFI, there is a charge for each device registered for the first time. Pitches directly on the beach are more expensive than in other rows. 30 minutes by bike from Malaga but very dangerous due to traffic, parallel to the highway next to the beach. Bus station 400 meters direct to the center of Malaga line 160. Reservations are recommended on weekends. Books and DVDs can be borrowed.

title: (29780) Nerja - 6 Calle Prolongación Hernando de Carabeo
title_short: (29780) Nerja - 6 Calle Prolongación Hernando de Carabeo
description: Lavanderia Self Service Launderette

title: (29710) Periana - 22 MA-156
description: Small parking in Baños de Vilo. Next to the river and 100 meters from the sulfurous baths.

title: (29780) Nerja - 16 Terreno Sup. 5
description:
Off street parking, unpaved, very quiet, I stood there for 2 nights
Enough space for several vehicles.

title: (29710) Periana - 54 Jr Jardines
description: Small "era", ideal for camper vans or even motorhomes

title: (18128) Zafarraya - 1 Calle Cementerio
description: Parking spot next to cemetery. nothing fancy but does the trick. close to village centre and some grocery shops

title: (29710) Periana - 52 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Very quiet place, there is room for two vans

title: (29720) Málaga - Carretera de Almerìa la Araña
title_short: (29720) Málaga - Carretera de Almerìa la Araña
description: Beach at the exit of a national, tables, barbecues, playground with swing, slide ... Magnificent view of the beach with a large rock by the water. With regret, we left because there were young people who were partying, maybe because it was a holiday (Thursday of the climb). Pity !!

title: (29780) Nerja - 5 Calle Mistral
description: Nice little corner near Nerja and hiking.

title: (29787) Maro -
description: Aparcamiento junto al puente del águila, en pleno barranco de maro, justo en el acceso a la cala barranco de maro. Pasamos la noche sin ningún ruido. Al otro lado del barranco hay algunos asentamientos hippies que viven allí y no molestan a nadie. Esta un poco en cuesta aunque aparcamos al final del aparcamiento que se encuentra casi plano. Paso la policía y ni siquiera se paró.

title: (29780) Nerja - Calle Carretera a la Cueva
title_short: (29780) Nerja - Calle Carretera a la Cueva
description: Free shaded parking at the entrance to the cueva Otherwise day parking, special motorhomes with water point to 20 m for the cave, but prohibited at night. Closing 21h

title: (29017) Málaga - 55 Carretera Almería la Araña
description: Parking lot full of people and shared with cars. Complicated to get out because the cars are blocking the way to turn. One night OK but not more

title: (29780) Nerja - 1 Urbanización Cueva de Nerja
description: In the asphalt parking lot in front of the grotto you can stand up well during the day, up to 7m no problem and better than on the sloping earth parking lot in front. Visit to the grotto with audio guide. Clean toilets and nice restaurant.

title: (29787) Nerja - 1B Urbanización Maro Club
description: Water fountain in the small park next to the roundabout

title: (29018) -
description: Gas station with a lazy water tap.

title: (29180) Riogordo - 6 Paseo de Andalucía
description: Push button water tap (good pressure, not threaded, probably for containers only). On road side by the local bins and recycle.

title: (18120) Alhama de Granada - A-402
description: Very nice view towards the sunset, a little set back from the road, in a left turn coming from the north (2 trees). A few passages of large fruit and vegetable trucks... The last at 9 p.m., the first at 9 a.m. Quiet otherwise.

title: (29017) Málaga - 41 Calle Almería
description: Parking lot at the roadside, which is hardly used. Right on the beach with a beautiful sea view!? Signs are not attached. Mostly full during the day, good for at night.

title: (29787) Maro - 30 Calle San Miguel
description: New Parking for Maro Beach, at the entrance of the town. The civil guard kicked us out of nearby places Parking level ground. During the day it is charged for people who go down to the coves of Maro. . Plenty of room in the middle of August. The road and highway are close and when trucks pass they make some noise. Otherwise well.

name: Narnia lodgings
title: (18128) Narnia lodgings
description:
Narnia Lodgings
Small beautiful campsite or pitch for caravans / tents and mobile homes, the owners speak German, English and Spanish. You are warmly welcomed here and have a nice, quiet spot in the middle of the Andalusian mountains. Pets and dogs are also welcome. Showers, toilets and washing machines are available.

title: (29180) Riogordo - 28 Calle Blas Infante
description: Dead end in an unused building area. lantern in place. Slightly oblique. Quiet and good for one night.

title: (29017) Málaga - 338 Avenida Salvador Allende
description: Free parking in front of the beach, no indication and in summer it is full, but the rest of the year, there are always motorhomes at night. Quiet area and surrounded by quality restaurants and cheap to eat pescaito de Málaga.

title: (29780) Nerja - Autovía del Mediterráneo
description: Place to fill up water. No grey/black water, 4 taps with mountain water. Just under the car bridge. Turn left from Nerja. Popular by the locals.

name: Villa Del Mar, Camping Nerja
title: (29787) Villa Del Mar, Camping Nerja
description:
Beautiful place of New opening, incredible place of rest in the middle of nature, without forgetting that it is Andalusia.
Beautiful chill out area, with a pool of delicious water and large and tasty snacks. Sometimes they have live music. 45 places are made up of different sizes, super clean bathrooms and impeccable showers. It is worth a stop along the way. The Nerja caves are a 20-minute walk away, the Cala de Maro, ideal for diving, a 25-minute walk away. There is a bus in the town that is a 10-minute walk away. Idyllic place to visit in the middle of nature away from urban tourism.

title: (29190) Málaga -
description: Natural area, hiking trails, museum ...

title: (29017) Málaga - 20 Calle Ortega Munilla
description: Self-service laundry at a great price, the washing machines leave the clothes smelling fresh, the dryer dries quickly. Go with banknotes because the change machine only accepts them or download the app to pay with your mobile phone. Highly recommended! WiFi available on site
